author: gstein
msg: Reverse-merge the COPY bucket stuff. Specifically, revision 1807 (its
introduction on the copy-bucket branch) through 1907 (its merge into
trunk/). This left a conflict due to continued edits while on trunk.
Those were resolved by just favoring the delete over the edits.
NOTE: svn:mergeinfo on '.' has not been updated with the reverse
